sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Home Depot topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.9%.
Year to date, Home Depot has lost about 6.5% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Goldman Sachs Group, trading down 2.5%.
Goldman Sachs Group is lower by about 25.5% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Boeing, trading down 1.2%, and Nike, trading up 0.8% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
